Description: Content is clearly related to a current or historical event
Content is related to an organ of government, government leaders, government policies etc
Content is related to an issue that affect a number of individuals or is considered problematic in a society such as public health, LBGTQ, nudity, illicit goods etc.
Content is related to dissidents, petitions, whistle-blowers
Content is related to nationalistic sentiments
Content is related to religion (excluding extremism)
Image of the same content appear more than once in the dataset
